catalog_info.title: Introduction to Non Fiction Videomaking
catalog_info.notes: Interested students must attend first meeting of class during shopping week to speak with teaching staff about course enrollment procedure. FIRST MEETING NOTE: Thursday, Sept. 3 from 1pm to 2pm in Sever 415, no meeting on Tuesday, Sept. 8. Students seeking to enroll are encouraged to bring a paragraph describing a proposed subject to the first class meeting.
catalog_info.description: Following an introductory exercise, each student will spend the term making a single nonfiction video on a subject of his or her choosing.
